about.name: Cezar Guimarães Carneiro
about.description: Experienced Full Stack Developer with a true innovative attitude. Has built scalable applications with modern patterns and technologies. Fluent in English and Portuguese.

work.title: Android Developer
work.description:
I develop Android applications with highly complex business logic to support sales and billing. My role is to design new functionalities, optimize performance and improve the overall usability – oftentimes refactoring existing code and enabling integration with other systems.
Aditionaly, I manage the "Continuous Integration" practice and encourage a testing culture across our teams through the introduction of new tools, technologies and techniques. As a result, we have improved software maintainability, leading to better products, faster deployment process and overall customer satisfaction.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description:
I supported the development of a corporate search engine utilizing Java and Apache Solr/Lucene. This search engine processes large amounts of data through pages, documents and database crawling and indexing. Its main purpose is to provide full-text search capability – enabling users to search multiple terms in hundreds of thousands of documents in a fraction of a second. 
I had the honor of working with an open-minded team that applied new patterns and technologies to consistently achieve high-scalability, availability and top-of-the-line functionalities.
In addition to supporting core development, I supported the design and implementation of RESTful APIs with Jersey 2 to create developer access the search engine.
Additionally, I led front-end development with AngularJS and later with Angular2 driving the product to an improved user experience. Finally, for a brief period of time, I led and concluded the development of an Android application.
